(Simplified: 韪)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 韋 indicates the sound; 是 (right) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 是 [ shì ] to be; indeed, right, yes; okay
    • 韋 [ wéi ] tanned leather; surname
①是，對(常和否定詞連用)：冒天下之大不韙。

韙字的基本解释

韙
wěi
见“韪”。

韙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于鬼切，上尾，云。］
亦作“愇1”。“韪1”的繁体字。
(1)指好的或正确的（言行）。
(2)指善政，治绩。
(3)安好；善美。
(4)以为是；同意；赞赏。

韙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1394第34
【唐韻】于鬼切【集韻】【韻會】羽鬼切，?音偉。【說文】是也。从是，韋聲。【左傳·隱十一年】犯五不韙。【前漢·敘傳】昭韙見戒。【註】張晏曰：是也。明其是者，戒其非也。【後漢·荀爽傳】五韙咸備。　【集韻】通作愇。

韪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Shangwei, Yun. ]
Also known as "stun 1". "韪1" in traditional characters.
(1) Refers to good or correct (words and deeds).
(2) Refers to good governance and governance.
(3) Well-being; good and beautiful.
(4) I think it is; agree; appreciate.
韪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韪; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1394 34
[Tang Yun] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Guiqie,? Yinwei. 【Said Wen】Yes. Since then, Wei Sheng. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleven Years] Committing five unsuccessful mistakes. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] Zhao Kun sees the precepts. [Note] Zhang Yan said: Yes. Those who know what is right, stop what is wrong. [Later Han·Xun Shuang Biography] Wu Qixian prepared.　【Jiyun】It's all stunned.
